Description: The length of the statement  "	//Write a method GetMax() with two parameters that returns the bigger of two integers. Write a program that reads 3 integers from the console and prints the biggest of them using the method GetMax(). " is 199.
The following statement contains a magic number: for (int i = 2; i < listOfNums.Length; i++) {  	max = GetMax (max' listOfNums [i]);  }
